message: If you're interested you're welcome to follow the development on Twitter: @metiorstats
Last but not least: I want to invite anyone interested to fork or otherwise contribute.

To make it short: Metior is a source code history analyzer API written in Ruby.

It's in an early development stage at the moment, so there's still a lot of work to do. Right now it's able to do some basic querying for commits and auhtors in Git repositories. Additionally you can also read from GitHub repositories using the GitHub API.

At least for the moment, it's just an API. In the future it might be accompanied by a CLI tool and/or a webapp to easily generate reports.

So check it out: http://github.com/koraktor/metior
Hey so is this instantiation line: Metior.simple_stats :git, '~/open-source/metior' refering to /user/repository for github?
